channel.title: Added new feature to bastions, would love feedback
channel.description:
Hey guys, I added a new feature to bastions which effectively pivots the product into a broader market. I would love your feedback on the new homepage/new feature (new feature seen in the "Create tests with a click" section of the homepage).
[https://bastions.co](https://bastions.co)
Let me know what you think.
